price: Ariko uyu munsi, abemeramana ni bo bari buseke abahakanyi.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
